import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../../assets/cssModules/homepage.module.css'; import useAxiosFetch from '../../../hooks/useAxiosFetch'; import defaultData from '../../../data/defaultData.json' const Services = () => { const [serviceList, setServiceList] = useState(defaultData.services.map((service, index) => { return (

{service.svName}

{service.content}

) })); const { data, fetchError } = useAxiosFetch('http://localhost:3500/services/'); useEffect(() => { if (fetchError != null) { alert(fetchError); } }, [fetchError]); console.log(defaultData.services); return (

OUR SERVICES

{serviceList} {/*

Software Development

Blockchain & DLT Applications Mobile & Web Appliocations Solution Architecture Agile Delivery Management

Product Innovation

Product Ownership & Management Product Discovery & Research Micro & Macro Analysis Data Driven UX Design

Enterprise Consulting

Digital Transformation Blockchain Strategy Prototyping & Proof of Concepts Technology & Product Roadmaps

Infrastructure and Security

Turnkey Cloud Infrastructure DevOps as Service Scalability, Reliability, Security

Economics

Game Theory & Incentive Design Network Effect Design Economic Modelling

Blockchain System

Trustless System Design Defining & Tokenising Value Public & Private Smart Contracts

*/}
) } export default Services
